file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-61-00-06 - EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an inspection on the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) unit for condition and on the ELT battery for corrosion and leakage. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - ALL 25-61-00-200-801-A ♦ INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-61-00 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the ELT unit for condition and of the ELT battery for corrosion and leakage. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT 110-4) AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT SA- AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-802-A/400 TORI) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-803-A/400 C406-2) - REMOVAL ARTEX CMM 570-1015 last revision - ARTEX CMM 570-5000 last revision - CMM ELT96A 25 60 000 000 / ELT97A 25 60 000 000 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Passenger cabin/lavatory - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task ELT unit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the toilet speaker panel. (2) Remove the electrical cover. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-61-00 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspect (General Visual Inspection) Emergency Locator Transmitter for Condition (Figure 601) (Figure 602) (Figure 603) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the ELT unit for correct installation: – Mounting. – Cables. (2) Examine the ELT case for corrosion and the battery for corrosion and leakage. If there is corrosion or leakage: – For ELT ARTEX 110-4, remove the ELT ( AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-801-A/400) and refer to ARTEX CMM 570-1015 last revision. – For ELT SATORI, remove the ELT ( AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-802-A/400) and refer to CMM ELT96A 25 60 000 000 / ELT97A 25 60 000 000. – For ELT ARTEX C406-2, remove the ELT ( AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-803-A/400) and refer to ARTEX CMM 570-5000 last revision. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the electrical cover. (2) Close the toilet speaker panel. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 25-61-00 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
